channel.title: Starting new account - need advice
channel.description:
Well I've decided to go back to runescape but not really going to invest much time.
I want to make a straight up ranged pure. No defence, attack, strength, or summoning.
I'm mainly just set on training range and only range, but if I have too I might decide to get prayer in the future. (44)
I need some tips on where to train and some money making levels or even some guides.
So far for ideas I have
-Train range at yaks or crabs -Quick 200-250k/HR snape grass
-Woodcutting is not as profitable as is snape grass so I'd rather snape than wc.
I have around 4-6 months without playing so if any one can update me on some new things that'd be great.
Thanks in advanced.

item.title: Starting new account - need advice
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

76k, make 50m, chin to 99 range

Read full topic

item.title: Starting new account - need advice
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“Toysbeus, post:3, topic:293397”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=388243.msg2902534#msg2902534 date=1249608461]
Can’t do yaks on a pure account because you need to complete Fremenik Trials.
[/quote]
I’m pretty sure you just need to start it.

Well maybe I’m wrong. Thanks though[/quote]

You need to complete fremmy trials, which I think gives other stats xp, or the requirements.

Read full topic
